title: PipeNet: Question Answering with Semantic Pruning over Knowledge Graphs
abstract: It is well acknowledged that incorporating explicit knowledge graphs (KGs) can benefit question answering. Existing approaches typically follow a grounding-reasoning pipeline in which entity nodes are first grounded for the query (question and candidate answers), and then a reasoning module reasons over the matched multi-hop subgraph for answer prediction. Although the pipeline largely alleviates the issue of extracting essential information from giant KGs, efficiency is still an open challenge when scaling up hops in grounding the subgraphs. In this paper, we target at finding semantically related entity nodes in the subgraph to improve the efficiency of graph reasoning with KG. We propose a grounding-pruning-reasoning pipeline to prune noisy nodes, remarkably reducing the computation cost and memory usage while also obtaining decent subgraph representation. translated_title: PipeNet:在知识图谱上使用语义修剪的问题回答
translated_abstract: 众所周知，在问题回答中引入显式的知识图谱(KG)可以带来好处。现有的方法通常遵循一个基础推理流程，在该流程中，首先将实体节点与查询(问题和候选答案)进行关联，然后使用推理模块对匹配的多跳子图进行推理，用于预测答案。虽然这个流程在从庞大的KG中提取必要信息方面取得了很大的改善，但在放大关联的子图时，效率仍然面临挑战。本文旨在找到子图中的语义相关的实体节点，以提高使用KG进行图推理时的效率。我们提出了一个基于关联-修剪-推理的流程来修剪噪声节点，在显著降低计算和内存使用的同时，还能获得良好的子图表示。具体来说，修剪模块首先根据匹配范围之间的依赖距离对概念节点进行评分，然后对其进行修剪。
tldr: 本论文提出了PipeNet方法，通过语义修剪技术在知识图谱上进行问题回答。该方法通过关联-修剪-推理的流程来修剪噪声节点，以提高图推理的效率，同时获得良好的子图表示。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes PipeNet, a method for question answering over knowledge graphs using semantic pruning. It prunes noisy nodes through a grounding-pruning-reasoning pipeline to improve efficiency of graph reasoning and obtain decent subgraph representation.
